snippet: A man who pretended to be a Rockefeller was found guilty of the first-degree murder Wednesday of a man whose bones were found beneath a San Marino home.
abstract: Christian Gerhartsreiter, who pretended to be a Rockefeller, is found guilty of the first-degree murder of John Sohus, whose bones were found beneath a San Marino, Calif, home.
lead_paragraph: A man who pretended to be a Rockefeller was found guilty of the first-degree murder Wednesday of a man whose bones were found beneath a San Marino home.

headline.main: California: Fake Rockefeller Guilty of Murder
headline.print_headline: California: Fake Rockefeller Guilty of Murder
